sqlMap.select:
SELECT SOLID_ID as "solidId", SOLID_CODE as "solidCode", SOLID_CODES as "solidCodes", SOLID_NAME as "solidName", SOLID_TYPE as "solidType", STATE as "state", RANK as "rank", SOLID_STATE as "solidState", REMARK as "remark" FROM ${platSchema}.TDUHM41
SOLID_TYPE = #node#
order by SOLID_ID asc

SELECT SOLID_ID as "solidId", SOLID_CODE as "solidCode", SOLID_CODES as "solidCodes", SOLID_NAME as "solidName", SOLID_TYPE as "solidType", STATE as "state", RANK as "rank", SOLID_STATE as "solidState", REMARK as "remark" FROM ${platSchema}.TDUHM41
SOLID_TYPE like #P_ename#
SOLID_STATE like #solidState#
order by SOLID_ID asc

SELECT SOLID_ID as "solidId", SOLID_CODE as "solidCode", SOLID_CODES as "solidCodes", SOLID_NAME as "solidName", SOLID_TYPE as "solidType", STATE as "state", RANK as "rank", SOLID_STATE as "solidState", REMARK as "remark" FROM ${platSchema}.TDUHM41
SOLID_STATE like #solidState#
SOLID_NAME like #solidName#
order by SOLID_ID asc
SELECT SOLID_ID as "solidId" FROM ${platSchema}.TDUHM41 where SOLID_STATE = '启用' order by SOLID_ID asc
SELECT SOLID_ID as "solidId" FROM ${platSchema}.TDUHM41 order by SOLID_ID desc limit 1
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ${platSchema}.TDUHM41 ( SOLID_ID, SOLID_NAME , SOLID_CODES , STATE , RANK , SOLID_STATE , REMARK ) VALUES ( #solidId: VARCHAR# , #solidName: VARCHAR# , #solidName: VARCHAR# , #state: VARCHAR# , #rank: VARCHAR# , #solidState: VARCHAR# , #remark: VARCHAR# )

INSERT INTO ${platSchema}.TDUHM41 ( SOLID_ID, SOLID_NAME , SOLID_CODES , SOLID_TYPE , STATE , RANK , SOLID_STATE , REMARK ) VALUES ( #solidId: VARCHAR# , #solidName: VARCHAR# , #solidName: VARCHAR# , #solidType: VARCHAR# , #state: VARCHAR# , #rank: VARCHAR# , #solidState: VARCHAR# , #remark: VARCHAR# )

INSERT INTO ${platSchema}.TDUHM41 ( SOLID_ID, SOLID_NAME , SOLID_CODE , SOLID_CODES , SOLID_TYPE , STATE , RANK , SOLID_STATE , REMARK ) VALUES ( #solidId: VARCHAR# , #solidName: VARCHAR# , #solidCode: VARCHAR# , #solidCode: VARCHAR# , #solidType: VARCHAR# , #state: VARCHAR# , #rank: VARCHAR# , #solidState: VARCHAR# , #remark: VARCHAR# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ${platSchema}.TDUHM41 SET SOLID_NAME = #solidName# , SOLID_CODE = #solidCode# , SOLID_CODES = #solidCode# , SOLID_TYPE = #solidType# , STATE = #state# , RANK = #rank# , SOLID_STATE = #solidState#, REMARK = #remark# WHERE SOLID_ID = #solidId#
